abstract: Mr. Pompeo issued a statement to denounce a reporter who said on the air this week that he had privately lashed out at her with profanities
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, who has tried to distance himself from what he calls “the noise” of the impeachment proceedings, issued an extraordinary official statement Saturday accusing a veteran NPR reporter who pressed him about his role in the Ukraine affair had “lied” to him and was a “shameful” example of the “unhinged” anti-Trump news media.
